channel.title: Home on Avellea
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Avellea

item.title: Dreameye
item.description: What is the Dreameye? So I had no idea what this little device was before I was told about it from a friend. As it turns out, like the PS2, the Dreamcast also had an attachable webcam. Pictured below is a Dreameye, next to a PS2 EyeToy. Image credits: Tom Charnock1 It was released to the Japanese market exclusively, with software called Visual Park. So what about the weird file format?

item.title: First post
item.description: Introduction I’m a pretty boring guy, so I thought I’d make a post about myself just to get that out of the way. Development career To start off, I do all of the development work for the Twitch VTuber KazukiVT.1 Right now they are running a proprietary panel for their stream. It will be open-sourced eventually, but I’m not sure when. I also do some web development on the side, though that’s pretty rare.
